entities.name: ronald weasley
entities.description: Ronald Weasley is mentioned as someone who will be relieved that Harry has come round.

entities.name: granger
entities.description: Granger is Hermione's surname and she is mentioned as someone who will be relieved that Harry has come round.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Professor Quirrell is the one who tried to take the Stone from Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in this conversation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's owl was mentioned as being sent to someone.

relationships.description: The narrator protected the Stone from Harry.
The narrator prevented Quirrell from taking the Stone.
The narrator reached London before it became clear that he should be at Hogwarts.
